channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How 2026 Winter Olympics Security Is Preparing For The Opening Ceremony

item.title: Ex-Capitol Police Officer Harry Dunn Seeks Maryland House Seat
item.description: Mr. Dunn, who rose to prominence for defending the Capitol during the Jan. 6 riot, will run for a hotly contested Southern Maryland seat.

item.title: Minneapolis Children Describe ‘Living in Fear,’ and China’s President Carries Out a Mass Purge
item.description: Plus, a fitting tribute to Catherine O’Hara.

item.title: Trump grants tariff breaks to 'politically connected' companies, Senate Dems say
item.description: The White House's trade policy has "opened the door to corruption," according to a letter from Ron Wyden and Chris Van Hollen.

item.title: For Peace, More Ukrainians Consider the Once Unthinkable: Surrendering Land
item.description: Polls show a growing acceptance of territorial concessions among a war-weary public, if Ukraine receives strong security guarantees.

item.title: A Hamas Hostage’s Secret Ordeal
item.description: Guy Gilboa-Dalal says he was sexually abused by one of his captors in the tunnels of Gaza and threatened with death if he said anything.
